title: Data Science, Machine Learning and Big Data: Current trends

author: Nada Lavrač, Odsek za tehnologije znanja, Institut "Jožef Stefan"

How do we define machine learning, which is the basic technology before the big neural network hype?
Machine learning is defined as computer algorithms or machines that learn predictive models from class labeled data.
